Title: Apocalypse Ow
Plot: Jeff?s unhinged Uncle Murray returns from Afghanistan and takes the boys to a ?fun? camp... but before long everyone except Jeff realises that things are not what they seem when they find out Murray has been brainwashed by the Taliban. Will Jeff turn on his friends once and for all? Featuring special guests: Neil Finn, Tim Finn, Bret McKenzie and Jemaine Clement (Flight of the Conchords).
ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language,sexual references and drug use
